artist: Artist: R. Crumb; Publisher: Agnes B. , Paris

description: Loose, folded leaves, photomechanical illustration of grotesque figures with text and designs printed in offset lithography on newsprint; 10 pp.
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Flesh and Blood Comics
